# slither

- Visit [Official Web Site](https://github.com/crytic#readme){target=_blank}

## Configuration in Mega-Linter

- Enable slither by adding `SOLIDITY_SLITHER` in [ENABLE_LINTERS variable](https://nvuillam.github.io/mega-linter/configuration/#activation-and-deactivation)
- Disable slither by adding `SOLIDITY_SLITHER` in [DISABLE_LINTERS variable](https://nvuillam.github.io/mega-linter/configuration/#activation-and-deactivation)

| Variable                                     | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                         | Default value            |
|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------|
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_ARGUMENTS                   | User custom arguments to add in linter CLI call<br/>Ex: `-s --foo "bar"`                                                                                                                                            |                          |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE        | Custom regex including filter<br/>Ex: `(src\|lib)`                                                                                                                                                                  | Include every file       |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE        | Custom regex excluding filter<br/>Ex: `(test\|examples)`                                                                                                                                                            | Exclude no file          |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_CLI_LINT_MODE               | Override default CLI lint mode<br/>- `file`: Calls the linter for each file<br/>- `list_of_files`: Call the linter with the list of files as argument<br/>- `project`: Call the linter from the root of the project | `{linter.cli_lint_mode}` |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_FILE_EXTENSIONS             | Allowed file extensions. `"*"` matches any extension, `""` matches empty extension. Empty list excludes all files<br/>Ex: `[".py", ""]`                                                                             | `[".sol"]`               |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_FILE_NAMES_REGEX            | File name regex filters. Regular expression list for filtering files by their base names using regex full match. Empty list includes all files<br/>Ex: `["Dockerfile(-.+)?", "Jenkinsfile"]`                        | Include every file       |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_PRE_COMMANDS                | List of bash commands to run before the linter                                                                                                                                                                      | None                     |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_POST_COMMANDS               | List of bash commands to run after the linter                                                                                                                                                                       | None                     |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_DISABLE_ERRORS              | Run linter but consider errors as warnings                                                                                                                                                                          | `false`                  |
| SOLIDITY_SLITHER_DISABLE_ERRORS_IF_LESS_THAN | Maximum number of errors allowed                                                                                                                                                                                    | `0`                      |

## Behind the scenes

### How are identified applicable files

- File extensions: `.sol`

<!-- markdownlint-disable -->
<!-- /* cSpell:disable */ -->
### How the linting is performed

- slither is called one time by identified file

### Example calls

```shell
slither uninitialized.sol
```


### Installation on mega-linter Docker image

- PIP packages (Python):
  - [slither-analyzer](https://pypi.org/project/slither-analyzer)
